description: Protective warmth arising from deepening love attachment - a sudden swell of caring closeness.
actor_description: A protective softness spreads through me. I want them okay. I want to stay close enough to matter. My voice gentles without me deciding to. My shoulders loosen; I lean in a fraction as if proximity is reassurance.
description_text: {actor} stays subtly close to their target of affection, attention tuned toward them in a protective, warm way.
